grammar_check.prompt: Check grammar and spelling in the following text. Highlight the incorrect parts and provide corrections in the format 'start, end, incorrect, suggestion'. Example format: 'start: 0, end: 2, incorrect: *he*, suggestion: *He*'. Here is the text: {{text}}

plagiarism_check.prompt: Check the following text for plagiarism. Highlight the plagiarized parts and provide suggestions in the format 'plagiarized -> suggestion'. Example format: 'highlighted_text: *he* copied this *text* errors: he -> He, text -> paragraph.' Here is the text: {{text}}

text_completion.prompt: Complete the following text and highlight your additions. Provide the result in the format 'highlighted_text: *completed text*' and 'errors: added -> added text'. Example format: 'highlighted_text: This is a *new sentence* errors: new sentence -> This is a new sentence.' Here is the text: {{text}}

paraphrasing.prompt: Paraphrase the following text. Highlight the paraphrased parts and provide the original to paraphrased mapping in the format 'original -> paraphrased'. Example format: 'highlighted_text: This is a *rephrased sentence* errors: rephrased sentence -> This is a rephrased sentence.' Here is the text: {{text}}
